messages.subject: Re: Homeschooling in Guam
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, Michele.  :-)  That was the one search engine I didn t use.  LOL!  But it had the best lead on info. I already emailed them. :-) ~  Many Thanks, Shannon in
messages.messageBody:
Hi, Michele. :-) That was the one search engine I didn't use. LOL! But
it had the best lead on info. I already emailed them. :-) ~ Many Thanks,
Shannon in CA ~



> From: "Michele Moss" <michele@...>
>
> > Date: 7 Aug 1999 19:53:55 -0000
>
> have you tried the search engine http://www.northernlight.com
>
> i did a quick search for keywords homeschooling guam and the top
> result is a site http://www.heptune.com
>
> their homeschooling FAQ page is http://www.heptune.com/school.html
>
> which also leads to their email address: heptune@...
>
> it's a start but they might have a list of support groups or other
> contacts to share! you might want to poke around some more at
> northernlights too. good luck!
>
> Michele Moss
> Infinity Computer Solutions
> Great Falls, MT
> 406-727-5609
> http://www.icstech.net
>

messages.subject: Re: Homeschooling in Guam
messages.msgSnippet: ... there s so many of them out there anymore it gets overwhelming.  I seem to keep coming back to northernlight.  I never can find anything i m looking for at
messages.messageBody:
> From: shannon hawkins <hawk141@...>
>
> Hi, Michele. :-) That was the one search engine I didn't use.

there's so many of them out there anymore it gets overwhelming. I
seem to keep coming back to northernlight. I never can find anything
i'm looking for at the big "Y" anymore. I really like the way
northernlight organizes the results and their power search is awesome
for narrowing your search.

i recently found a great kid's search engine too. I use it a lot
when i'm looking for kid's stuff cuz i don't get all the irrelevant
results i would normally get in regular search engines. it is
http://www.searchopolis.com

> LOL! But it had the best lead on info. I already emailed them. :-)
> ~ Many Thanks, Shannon in CA ~
>
GREAT!


Michele Moss
Mom of Sterling Tyler age 3 yrs old
Parents of Spirited Kids Resource Web site:
http://www.icstech.net/~michele
Parents of Spirited Kids Discussion Group:
http://www.egroups.com/list/psk
